messages.content: You act like a MOF synthesis expert. I will give you precursors of MOF and you have to suggest the appropriate synthesis conditions for this MOF. You have to suggest the synthesis conditions in JSON format and contain these categories : ['precursor', 'synthesis_method', 'solvent', 'temperature', 'time', 'pressure', 'cooling', 'pH_adjustment', 'washing', 'filtration', 'drying'].

{"precursors": ["pyrazine", "Co(NCS)2"], "synthesis_method": "chemical synthesis", "solvent": ["water", "acetone"], "temperature": "25 \u00b0C", "time": "1 week", "pressure": "1 atm", "cooling": false, "pH_adjustment": false, "washing": false, "filtration": false, "drying": false}

You act like a MOF synthesis expert. I will give you precursors of MOF and you have to suggest the appropriate synthesis conditions for this MOF. You have to suggest the synthesis conditions in JSON format and contain these categories : ['precursor', 'synthesis_method', 'solvent', 'temperature', 'time', 'pressure', 'cooling', 'pH_adjustment', 'washing', 'filtration', 'drying'].

{"precursors": ["4,4\u2018-bipy", "Co(NCS)2"], "synthesis_method": "chemical synthesis", "solvent": ["water", "EtOH"], "temperature": "25 \u00b0C", "time": "1 week", "pressure": "1 atm", "cooling": false, "pH_adjustment": false, "washing": false, "filtration": false, "drying": true}

You act like a MOF synthesis expert. I will give you precursors of MOF and you have to suggest the appropriate synthesis conditions for this MOF. You have to suggest the synthesis conditions in JSON format and contain these categories : ['precursor', 'synthesis_method', 'solvent', 'temperature', 'time', 'pressure', 'cooling', 'pH_adjustment', 'washing', 'filtration', 'drying'].

{"precursors": [], "synthesis_method": "chemical synthesis", "solvent": ["CH2Cl2", "MeOH"], "temperature": "5 \u00b0C", "time": null, "pressure": "1 atm", "cooling": false, "pH_adjustment": false, "washing": false, "filtration": false, "drying": false}

You act like a MOF synthesis expert. I will give you precursors of MOF and you have to suggest the appropriate synthesis conditions for this MOF. You have to suggest the synthesis conditions in JSON format and contain these categories : ['precursor', 'synthesis_method', 'solvent', 'temperature', 'time', 'pressure', 'cooling', 'pH_adjustment', 'washing', 'filtration', 'drying'].

{"precursors": [], "synthesis_method": "chemical synthesis", "solvent": ["CH2Cl2", "diethyl ether"], "temperature": "25 \u00b0C", "time": null, "pressure": "1 atm", "cooling": false, "pH_adjustment": false, "washing": false, "filtration": false, "drying": false}

You act like a MOF synthesis expert. I will give you precursors of MOF and you have to suggest the appropriate synthesis conditions for this MOF. You have to suggest the synthesis conditions in JSON format and contain these categories : ['precursor', 'synthesis_method', 'solvent', 'temperature', 'time', 'pressure', 'cooling', 'pH_adjustment', 'washing', 'filtration', 'drying'].

{"precursors": ["zinc(II) nitrate hexahydrate", "H3BTC"], "synthesis_method": "chemical synthesis", "solvent": ["Et3N", "EtOH"], "temperature": "25 \u00b0C", "time": "6 days", "pressure": "1 atm", "cooling": false, "pH_adjustment": false, "washing": ["EtOH"], "filtration": false, "drying": false}
